CustomField.formula: IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='PM/PO',uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProgramOfficerUserIds__c+','+uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectManagerUserIds__c, IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='Grantee', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectTeamUserIds__c, IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='GAM', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_GAM__c , IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='GAM', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_GAM__c , IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='PRC', uNI_PRCLeadMember__c+','+uNI_PRCIds__c , IF( AND(uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='PT',uNI_HasAllPTClearedSMTPackage__c), uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectTeamUserIds__c, IF( uNI_SecondaryActionOwner__c='SMT', uNI_SMTMemberIds__c , uNI_SecondaryWaitingForActionByIds__c)))))))
CustomField.label: Secondary Waiting for Action Id Formula
